akn:content.akn:p:
§ 617m. Reclamation law applicable This subchapter shall be deemed a supplement to the reclamation law, which said reclamation law shall govern the construction, operation, and management of the works herein authorized, except as otherwise therein provided. (Dec. 21, 1928, ch. 42, § 14, 45 Stat. 1065.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThe reclamation law, referred to in text, is defined in section 617k of this title.
